comprehensive_overview: Spack is a flexible package manager for supercomputers, HPC systems, and other large-scale computing environments. It is designed to support multiple versions and configurations of software on a wide range of platforms.
core_features: Spack allows users to easily install, configure, and manage a wide variety of software packages. It supports custom builds, dependencies, and compilers, and offers a simple command-line interface for package management. Spack is highly customizable and can be used with a wide range of HPC systems and architectures.
